pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract Coordinate System Metadata // Obtain coordinate system metadata from various data formats. There are functions to extract a 'CRS' (coordinate reference system, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spatial_reference_system) in 'EPSG' (European Petroleum Survey Group, http://www.epsg.org/), 'PROJ4' https://proj.org/, or 'WKT2' (Well-Known Text 2, http://docs.opengeospatial.org/is/12-063r5/12-063r5.html) forms. This is purely for getting simple metadata from in- memory formats, please use other tools for out of memory data sources.
